root.TargetConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = CLZ;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.SelectQuery: select truename,wecha_id as wechat_id,COUNT(orderid) as totalOrder,FROM_UNIXTIME(time,'%Y-%m-%d') as time,sum(total) as totalCount,sum(price) as totalPrice from wx_product_cart group by truename,wecha_id,FROM_UNIXTIME(time,'%Y-%m-%d');
